section.title: Docker Engine configuration on master host (CC-3455)
section.p: Previously, the Docker Engine configuration procedures in the and the instructed users to set the --insecure-registry flag in /etc/sysconfig/docker. This setting is not needed on the master host in a cluster, and required on all delegate hosts.

section.title: Error in PREIN scriptlet in rpm package of serviced (CC-3512)
section.p: When upgrading to 1.3.1, the rpm package checks for a serviced thinpool. Since delegates do not have a thinpool, the upgrade fails. To workaround this issue, prepend NOCHECK=1 before the yum install command. The updated command should read: NOCHECK=1 yum --enablerepo=zenoss-stable install serviced-1.3.1
